abstract: Royal Dutch Shell has agreed to buy the oil exploration company Cove Energy for £992 million as it looks to expand into East Africa in search of new energy reserves.
snippet: Royal Dutch Shell has agreed to buy the oil exploration company Cove Energy for £992 million as it looks to expand into East Africa in search of new energy reserves.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Royal Dutch Shell agreed on Wednesday to buy the oil exploration company Cove Energy for £992 million ($1.6 billion) as it looks to expand into East Africa in search of new energy reserves.

headline.main: Shell to Buy Cove Energy for $1.6 Billion
